result.title: Runtime error in python 2
result.content:
Hello every one . I have solved a problem with python 2 but code forces shows me runtime error . could you please tell me how i can solve this problem with code forces ? The problem is : 25A This is my code : 

n = input()
array = []
a1 = []
a2 = []
for i in range(0,n) :
	temp = input()
	array.append(temp)
	if array[i] % 2 :
		a1.append(i)
	else :
		a2.append(i)
if len(a1) < len(a2) :
	print a1[0] + 1, "\n"
else :
	print a2[0] + 1, "\n"
